author: kkolinko
msg: Assert that MappingData object is empty before performing mapping work.
The old code just skipped all work in that case, but I do not see why that would be useful,
and it may return inconsistent results.
The comet, async, websocket examples do work successfully with this change.
It is backport of r1604434 from tomcat/trunk.

author: kkolinko
msg: Ensure that re-mapping selects the context version that we expect.
